For people in a suicidal crisis or in the immediate aftermath of a suicide attack.

A quiet welcome.

Keeping the patient safe.

A doctor must decide whether to admit the patient to hospital.

'''Systematic psychiatric opinion:'''

Once her non-psychiatric clinical condition has stabilised

Purpose of the psychiatric interview :

* Assess the potential for suicidal crisis (risk/urgency/dangerousness), evaluate associated psychiatric disorders and guide treatment.
* Decide on the indication for medicinal treatment
** sedative or anxiolytic in case of agitation or severe anxiety;
** hypnotic in the case of severe transient insomnia.
** prescription for symptomatic purposes, limited in time.

question.title: What is the primary purpose of a psychiatric interview in a patient who has been involved in a suicidal crisis or immediate aftermath of a suicide attack?

option_a.title: To determine the patient's medical history

option_b.title: To assess the patient's mental health and provide emotional support

option_c.title: To decide whether to prescribe medication

option_d.title: To evaluate the patient's risk of future suicidal behavior

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
